content.p: Without using a calculator, evaluate \left({{base1}}\right)^{ {{powernum1}}/{{powerden1}} }. Explain the roles played by the numerator, denominator, and sign (positive or negative) in the exponent.
Your answer should either be an integer or be a fraction of the form \frac{1}{n}.

Simplify the following expression to one of the following four forms (with A and n some positive integers): A x^n, or \displaystyle \frac{A}{x^n}, or \displaystyle \frac{1}{A} x^n, or \displaystyle \frac{1}{A x^n}. \left({{base3}}\right)^{ {{powernum3}}/{{powerden3}} }
